nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.dsl

Class SpecificationBuilderHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.dsl.SpecificationBuilderHelper

  • public class SpecificationBuilderHelper
extends Object
    A list of static methods that can be imported into a test implementation for quickly adding test specifications
    Author:
    David MacDonald

                                                   String description)
        Parameters:
        endpointUri - The endpoint URI that an asynchronous message should be sent to
        description - A description for the test specification that clearly identifies it
        Returns:
        An asynchronous test specification builder with the endpoint uri and description configured
